result.eng: I saw the poor old stooping man.
result.ga: chonaic mé an seanfhear bocht cromtha
result.orig: Chonaic mé an seanfhear bocht cromtha
result.html: chonaic mé an seanfhear bocht cromthaI saw the poor old stooping man.
result.ponchtml: ċonaic mé an seanḟear boċt cromṫaI saw the poor old stooping man.

result.eng: Ireland was a poor country a long time ago.
result.ga: ba thír bhocht í Éire fadó
result.orig: Ba thír bhocht í Éire fadó
result.html: ba thír bhocht í Éire fadóIreland was a poor country a long time ago.
result.ponchtml: ba ṫír ḃoċt í Éire fadóIreland was a poor country a long time ago.

result.ga: is bocht an scéal é
result.html: is bocht an scéal éIt is bad news.
result.ponchtml: is boċt an scéal éIt is bad news.

result.eng: The poor old woman is on her last legs.
result.ga: tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridh
result.orig: Tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridh
result.html: tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridhThe poor old woman is on her last legs.
result.ponchtml: tá an tseanḃean ḃoċt ar an dé deiriḋThe poor old woman is on her last legs.

result.eng: I pity the poor woman who died.
result.ga: tá trua agam don bhean bhocht a fuair bás
result.orig: Tá trua agam don bhean bhocht a fuair bás
result.html: tá trua agam don bhean bhocht a fuair básI pity the poor woman who died.
result.ponchtml: tá trua agam don ḃean ḃoċt a fuair básI pity the poor woman who died.

result.eng: We will be in An Béal Bocht tomorrow night in the Bronx.
result.ga: beidh muid sa mbéal bocht oíche amárach sa mbronx
result.orig: Beidh muid sa mBéal Bocht oíche amárach sa mBronx
result.html: beidh muid sa mbéal bocht oíche amárach sa mbronxWe will be in An Béal Bocht tomorrow night in the Bronx.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ muid sa mbéal boċt oíċe amáraċ sa mbronxWe will be in An Béal Bocht tomorrow night in the Bronx.

result.eng: She was deeply hurt looking at the poor man.
result.ga: goineadh go croí í ag féachaint ar an duine bocht
result.orig: Goineadh go croí í ag féachaint ar an duine bocht
result.html: goineadh go croí í ag féachaint ar an duine bochtShe was deeply hurt looking at the poor man.
result.ponchtml: goineaḋ go croí í ag féaċaint ar an duine boċtShe was deeply hurt looking at the poor man.

result.html: is bocht liom do scéalI'm sorry to hear that.
result.ponchtml: is boċt liom do scéalI'm sorry to hear that.

result.eng: Only poor people take the bus.
result.ga: ní thógann ach daoine bochta an bus
result.orig: Ní thógann ach daoine bochta an bus
result.html: ní thógann ach daoine bochta an busOnly poor people take the bus.
result.ponchtml: ní ṫógann aċ daoine boċta an busOnly poor people take the bus.

result.eng: She'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!
result.ga: b'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé mise
result.orig: B'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé mise
result.html: b'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé miseShe'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!
result.ponchtml: b'ḟada i dteaċ na mboċt nó ag cruinniú na déirce í aċ go bé miseShe'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!

result.eng: It's a good thing the poor man isn't in.
result.ga: is mór an gar gan an duine bocht a bheith istigh
result.orig: Is mór an gar gan an duine bocht a bheith istigh
result.html: is mór an gar gan an duine bocht a bheith istighIt's a good thing the poor man isn't in.
result.ponchtml: is mór an gar gan an duine boċt a ḃeiṫ istiġIt's a good thing the poor man isn't in.
